Title: Provides a reimbursement to small businesses and residential consumers of certain utilities for failure to provide contracted services; requires the Long Island power authority to do the same
Summary: Provides a reimbursement to small businesses and residential consumers of certain utilities for failure to provide contracted services; requires the Long Island power authority to do the same.
LawCode: Add ยง119-e, Pub Serv L; amd ยง1020-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to providing a reimbursement to small business and residential consumers of certain utilities for failure to provide contracted services
